name: Comesvil SpA
goal: Comesvil is an Italian company leading for over 30 years in the automation systems industry and ranking among the world major companies in the railway and telecommunication industry, providing engineered solutions, manufacturing and installing its products under its own supervision. Comesvil is specialised in automation and telecommunication systems applied to railway infrastructures. We are recognised by the market as an experienced integrator of rail telecommunication systems, driverless and automatic train control systems (DCS), CCTV systems, Personal Information Systems, Office in the Train and SCADA systems. We strictly collaborate with Ansaldo-Hitachi, Hitachi Rail, Leonardo, Rete Ferroviaria Italiana (RFI).
euInitiatives: Initiative of support to Research and Development of innovative technologies and products to improve the competitiveness in the public transport, and in particular in the metro and high velocity/high capacity railways infrastructure.
